Six categories of courses are being offered in this program: Discipline Specific Core Courses

bridge the gap between biology, physics, and computational sciences. The course integrates
biophysical principles, molecular biology, computational biology, and bioinformatics to
generate, interpret, and analyze large-scale biological datasets. The curriculum integrates
theoretical knowledge with practical skills to train students in modern biophysics and
bioinformatics, making them competent for careers in academia, healthcare, pharmaceuticals,
